title: Schema Descriptor
description: A descriptor that contains metadata about an XDM schema, including an optional property and array item selector, used to address the descriptor to a specific property or item.

@id.title: Identifier
@id.description: The unique identifier for the schema descriptor. This property is required when the descriptor is defined outside of the applicable schema, but is optional when applied via 'meta:descriptors'

@type.title: Type
@type.description: The type of descriptor this object represents

meta:enum.xdm:identityContext: Describes how a property of a schema may be treated as an identity when it does not contain all the properties of the Identity schema
meta:enum.xdm:primaryKey: Indicates that the specified property should be used as the primary storage key
meta:enum.xdm:updatePolicy: Describes the update policy for the source schema, which defines how new data is merged, accumulated, or replaced
meta:enum.xdm:instantiable: Indicates whether the specified schema should be allowed to be instanitated directly, for example in a dataset

xdm:sourceSchema.title: Source Schema
xdm:sourceSchema.description: The source schema this descriptor applies to. This property is required when the descriptor is defined outside of the applicable schema, but is optional when applied via 'meta:descriptors'

xdm:sourceProperty.title: Source Property
xdm:sourceProperty.description: When present, the property of the source schema to which this descriptor applies. This value is a JSON Pointer, applied to an instance of an object described by 'xdm:sourceSchema'.

xdm:sourceItem.title: Source Item
xdm:sourceItem.description: When present, the selector used to match a specific item in the array pointed to by sourceProperty
